b) NCE meritsin three (3) subjects including History 
orGovernment.  
AAU requires 'O' levelcredit pass in History and ‘O’ 
level pass in Science subjects.  
AAUA requires 'O' level credit passes in History or 
Government, English Language, Mathematics and 
any two (2) subjects from the Arts or Social Sciences. 
AUE and EBSU require 'O' level credit pass in 
Mathematics  
BIU requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes in English  
Language, Government/History, another Arts 
subject and any other two (2)Arts or Social Sciences  
subjects  
BOWEN and AJAYI require 'O' level credit passes 
which must include English Language, History or 
Government, and any other three (3) subjects in 
Arts or Social Sciences. Geography is not 
compulsory.  
CHRISTOPHER requires five (5) ‘O’ leve l credit 
passes at not more than two (2) sittings to include 
English Language, History/Government.  
KSU, FED-WUKARI, DELSU and UYO 'O' level credit 
pass in Geography is not compulsory but accept any 
three (3)  other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
  
  
   (viii)  PLASU, UNIOSUN and JOS 'O' level credit pass in 
Geography is not compulsory.  
    (ix)  JABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Government or History and any other Arts or Social 
Science subjects including ‘O’ level pass in 
Mathematics  
    (x)  KWASU and ILORIN require five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, History/Government. 
plus any other three (3)Arts or Social Science 
subjects.
